context.description: The Validation View displays errors, warnings, and information messages about the files in your workspace.
The Actions View has been replaced by the Scripts View and the Snippets View.

Use the References View to manage the libraries that you can use for Code Assist. The documentation for a library will not be available to you in Code Assist unless you add that library to the References View.

Scripts are generally more complicated than Snippets and usually perform automation tasks within your IDE. An example of this would be to create a new scriptable view or a Code Assist profile. The Scripts View contains more examples for you to learn from and use.
